org.crosswire.jsword.index.lucene.analysis
类 PersianLuceneAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer

所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Closeable
public class PersianLuceneAnalyzer
extends AbstractBookAnalyzer

An Analyzer whose TokenStream is built from a ArabicLetterTokenizer filtered with LowerCaseFilter, ArabicNormalizationFilter, PersianNormalizationFilter and Persian StopFilter (optional)

作者：
DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]

reusableTokenStream

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream reusableTokenStream(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                                  java.io.Reader reader)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
Returns a (possibly reused) TokenStream which tokenizes all the text in the provided Reader.

覆盖：
类 org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer 中的 reusableTokenStream
返回：
A TokenStream built from a ArabicLetterTokenizer filtered with LowerCaseFilter, ArabicNormalizationFilter, PersianNormalizationFilter and Persian Stop words
抛出：
java.io.IOException
